summary:
[u]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN[/u]
Adds glowing spider follower to Tel Mithryn Tower.
descriptionHtml:
Every wanted a permanent spider follower similar to the scrolls, well...TAHDAH! This spider companion can be found in the Tel Mithryn tower where Neloth can also be found. This spider is using the glowing spdier skin which Bethesda chose to leave out of the game so she is unique. Arachne also has an edited script so she can be rehired. She is also name after the very first spider from greek mythology, Arachne. I have made a second version for those who would like only a pet rather than a companion.
[u]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN[/u]

[size=5][u]Version 1(FOLLOWER):[/u][/size]

[size=3]Arachne[/size]

[u]Stats:[/u]
Speed=150(Normal Spider)
Level min of 50 and max 100
Leveled with player x1
Base Attack:65
30 Base Health 
30 Base Stamina
30 Base Magicka
Is essential
Doesn\'t effect stealth meter
Class=Frostbite Spider

[u]Skill(min)(Leveled with player):[/u]
100 One-handed
15 Two-handed
100 Archery
100 Block
15 Smithing
15 Heavy armour
15 Light armour
15 Pickpocket
15 Lockpicking
100 Sneak
15 Alteration
15 Speech
15 illusion
15 Alteration
15 Conjuration
15 Enchanting 
15 Restoration
15 Destruction

[u]AI Data:[/u]
Unaggressive
Happy
Foolhardy
Helps Friends and Allies
50 Energy

[size=5][u]Version 2(PET):[/u][/size]

  Stats are not needed due to that she will not fight. In this version the spider is named Suco in the Tel Mithryn tower as well. Suco is identicale to Arachne but you could use both if you would like. She is invunreable and will run from any combat however when the combat is finished she will return to your side. I made this version for the user Joshuahoeth. 

I hope you enjoy and please endorse and comment! :)
author: The Mad Meister
